profile.getInTouch: Get in touch with {{name}} to discuss opportunities and learn more about their experience.

humanResource.understandDescription: We begin by understanding your organization's unique culture, challenges, and objectives to create tailored HR solutions.
humanResource.implementDescription: Our team of experts implements customized HR strategies and programs designed to meet your specific needs.
humanResource.optimizeDescription: We continuously measure, refine, and optimize your HR processes to drive ongoing improvement and ROI.
humanResource.industriesWeServeDescription: Our HR expertise spans across multiple industries, each with their unique workforce challenges

submitResume.feature1Description: Advanced algorithms that understand your unique career profile and match you with opportunities that align perfectly with your goals.
submitResume.feature2Description: Discover hidden opportunities from our exclusive network of premium employers and startups looking for exceptional talent.
submitResume.feature3Description: Get instant alerts when new positions matching your criteria become available. Never miss your dream opportunity again.
submitResume.feature4Description: Your personal information is encrypted and secure. We respect your privacy while helping you advance your career.

partnerRegister.heroSubtitle: Join hundreds of professionals who found their dream jobs in Turkey. We handle everything from visa processing to job placement - completely free for candidates.
partnerRegister.whyWorkInTurkeyDescription: Discover the incredible opportunities and lifestyle that Turkey offers to international professionals.
partnerRegister.howItWorksDescription: Our simple 4-step process gets you from application to working in Turkey.
partnerRegister.whatWeProvideDescription: Everything you need for a successful career move to Turkey.
partnerRegister.benefit1Description: Complete visa and work permit assistance at no cost to you
partnerRegister.benefit2Description: Help finding suitable housing near your workplace
partnerRegister.benefit3Description: Fair wages according to Turkish labor standards
partnerRegister.benefit4Description: Full legal support and workers' rights protection
partnerRegister.processStep1Description: Submit your detailed application and documents
partnerRegister.processStep2Description: We match you with suitable employers in Turkey
partnerRegister.processStep3Description: We prepare and submit all visa applications
partnerRegister.processStep4Description: Start your new career journey in Turkey
partnerRegister.fact1Description: Strong economic growth creating new job opportunities
partnerRegister.fact2Description: Large international community working in Turkey
partnerRegister.fact3Description: Beautiful country with great work-life balance
partnerRegister.createYourProfileDescription: Complete your registration to get matched with the perfect job opportunities in Turkey. It's completely free!
partnerRegister.registrationSuccess: Registration submitted successfully! We will review your profile and contact you within 3-5 business days with potential job opportunities.
partnerRegister.placeholderMotivation: Why do you want to work in Turkey?
partnerRegister.hearAboutUs: How did you hear about us?
partnerRegister.placeholderAdditionalCertifications: List any professional certifications, courses, or training you have completed
partnerRegister.placeholderProfessionalSkills: List your key skills, software knowledge, machinery experience, etc.

general.partnersSectionDescription: We are profoundly grateful to our partners for placing their trust in us. Your confidence and unwavering support drive our shared success.

features.targetedRecruitmentDesc: Precise matching of candidates to job requirements.
features.performanceTrackingDesc: Advanced metrics to measure recruitment success.
features.qualityAssuranceDesc: Thorough vetting of all candidates before presentation.

growth.title: Consistent Year-Over-Year Growth
growth.description: Our metrics demonstrate consistent performance improvement across all key indicators. We continue to expand our reach and improve our services.
